content: hexagon cardigan for dolls suited for 18 /45cm dolls eg our generation american girl journey girls etc i used -dk yarn -4mm hook -approx 170m of yarn simple pattern but not for complete beginners if you have made a traditional granny square or a previous hexi cardigan and have some experiance reading patterns then you will do ok no photos added yet just written instructions this is my first time writing up a pattern so please let me know if you notice any errors or if i can make it easier to understand in any way version one - is my first upload no pictures except the finished product i will be adding photos and more options etc and when i do i will name it version two etc and put a little announcment in this box
